config.param: [{'name':'是否出警','type':'show','key':'IS_POLICE_OUT','是':[{'key':'IS_FOUND'},{'key':'NOTE'}],'否':[{'key':'IS_CANCEL_DISPATCHED'}]},{'name':'是否发现可疑人员','type':'hide','key':'IS_FOUND','是':[{'key':'IS_CONTROL'},{'key':'NOTE'}],'否':[]},{'name':'是否已控制可疑人员','type':'hide','key':'IS_CONTROL','是':[{'key':'IS_CONSISTENT'},{'key':'NOTE'}],'否':[{'key':'NOTE'}]},{'name':'可疑人员身份是否与告警一致','type':'hide','key':'IS_CONSISTENT','是':[{'key':'NOTE'}],'否':[{'key':'NOTE'}]},{'name':'是否撤控','type':'hide','key':'IS_CANCEL_DISPATCHED','是':[],'否':[{'key':'IS_SEX_MATCHING'},{'key':'IS_IDENTITY_ID_MATCHING'},{'key':'IS_APPEARANCE_MATCHING'}]},{'name':'性别是否一致','type':'hide','key':'IS_SEX_MATCHING','是':[{'key':'OTHER'}],'否':[{'key':'OTHER'}]},{'name':'年龄是否一致','type':'hide','key':'IS_IDENTITY_ID_MATCHING','是':[{'key':'OTHER'}],'否':[{'key':'OTHER'}]},{'name':'样貌是否一致','type':'hide','key':'IS_APPEARANCE_MATCHING','是':[{'key':'OTHER'}],'否':[{'key':'OTHER'}]},{'name':'是否有其他不出警理由','showTheCondition':{'IS_SEX_MATCHING':'1','IS_IDENTITY_ID_MATCHING':'1','IS_APPEARANCE_MATCHING':'1'},'type':'hide','key':'OTHER','是':[{'key':'NOTE'}],'否':[]},{'name':'备注','type':'show','key':'NOTE'}]
